lead_paragraph: As the number of suspected cases of match-fixing in tennis soars, the head of the ATP said Wednesday that more money needs to be given to the agency working to combat corruption.

headline.print_headline: ATP President: More Should Be Spent on Combating Corruption
headline.main: ATP President: More Should Be Spent on Combating Corruption

snippet: As the number of suspected cases of match-fixing in tennis soars, the head of the ATP said Wednesday that more money needs to be given to the agency working to combat corruption....
